headline: Accomplished Transportation and Logistics Executive Bob Biesterfeld Joins ATL Partners as Senior Operating Executive
summary: NEW YORK, February 24, 2026--ATL Partners ("ATL"), a premier sector-focused private equity firm investing in commercial aerospace, national security, and transportation and logistics, today announced that Bob Biesterfeld has joined the firm as a Senior Operating Executive. In this role, Mr. Biesterfeld will work closely with ATL’s investment professionals and portfolio company management teams to support strategic and operational initiatives across the firm’s focus sectors.
